ComicInfo.Title: Walk the Darkling Road!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-20 20:07:38. [CVDB15693] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:52:00. [Issue ID 29126]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Gil Kane,Sal Buscema,Bob McLeod,Sal Buscema,Bob McLeod
ComicInfo.Inker: Bob McLeod,Sal Buscema,Tom Palmer,John Romita,John Romita,Bob McLeod
ComicInfo.Characters: Kthara (villain, introduction),Gloria Hefford,Son of Satan [Daimon Hellstrom],June Hefford,Katherine Reynolds,Satana,Lewis Hefford
ComicInfo.Summary: Walk the Darkling Road!: Daimon travels to Los Angeles and, with the help of his sister Satana, defeats Kthara, a Lord of Hell.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
